title: 391: CHATTY BROS: Mama’s Bros!
itunes:title: 391: CHATTY BROS: Mama’s Bros!
description:
It’s almost Mother’s Day so Grayston and Evan chat about their moms growing up, watching Bekah and Jess become moms, take a parenting quiz to find out what kind of parent they are, and much more!

 

CHATTY BROS INSTAGRAM:

Chatty Bros: https://www.instagram.com/chattybrospodcast/

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/
